venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest-- East Entrance

item.description:
Join the Park Interpreter on a hike through Myles Standish State Forest. Challenge yourself on our monthly Long Hike. This hike is 5-7 miles in length. Please wear bug spray, sunscreen, and supportive shoes.  Bring along water and a snack.  We’ll meet at the East Entrance Parking Lot #4.
All programs are free and open to the public. Rain cancels. An adult must accompany children.  Reasonable accommodations available upon request.  For more information, call the Park Interpreters at (508) 866-2580 or visit http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/southeast/mssf.htm.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR's Off the Beaten Path- The Long Hike
